resources.string: Turn on or off float multitask
Long press the BACK key to turn on and off quickly
The bell volume increase When a device is located in the pocket
After opening,you can wear gloves to touch screen
The use of distance sensors, to prevent touch phone non-Autonomously in your pocket due to the squeeze or slide caused by fabric
The screen will continue to light up when you are looking at it
Double click to light up screen
Double tap HOME key to wake up
Double tap HOME to quickly lock screen
After opening, you can operate the mini screen with single hand
Touch-screen operation to open mini screen mode

After opening, you could open mini screen mode by sliding inward from the right side of the screen and then sliding outwards, also you could close the mini screen mode by doing the same action in the mini screen window.
Please first close the mini screen mode.
Please first close the magic flinger.
The following reasons lead to slow speed
Many people at the same time connecting
Far distance signal is weak focus
To automatically share WiFi hotspots connected
There are available free of charge near WiFi remind
There is no available free WiFi
Welcome to use free WiFi, freeme os provide you with Free and safe network environment

Any where, three pointer swipe up to start hotnot
Reverse phone to mute the ringing call and the clock
Make a phone call when mobile phone rapid near the ear
Answering the phone when mobile phone rapid near the ear

Choose default Storage and view Storage usage detail
Turn on this option will be used to optimize the memory recycled, very few applications may run unstable

"You are already in advanced developer mode, without the need for this operation."

Double click to light up screen

"Double click to light up screen when it's black"

Wave your palm across the top of the phone can unlock it
Wave your palm over the top of the phone (3cm-5cm) to unlock it
Please wave your palm across the top of the phone (3cm-5cm) to try non-touch unlock, tap back key to exit
You have tried non-touch unlock, tap screen or back key to exit
Put phone close to ear to call contact of interface
Put phone close to ear to call contact of interface

Put phone close to ear to answer
Put the phone to your ear to answer call

Keep ringing when pick up phone

Put phone close to ear to turn off the speaker

Cover the screen to mute the phone when ringing
Cover the screen can mute the phone when ringing
Please cover the screen with your palm to try cover the screen to mute, tap back key to exit
Please cover the screen with your palm to try cover the screen to mute, tap back key to exit
You have tried cover the screen to mute, tap screen or back key to exit
Wave your palm across the top of the phone (3cm-5cm) can mute or answer the call when it is ringing

Shaking to open camera or flashlight in light and locked interface and standby interface
Shaking phone to try shake to open flashlight, tap back key to exit
Shaking phone to try shake to open camera, tap back key to exit
Shaking phone to try shake to open mini screen, tap back key to exit

as the default calling card in call settings
Tilt the phone to zoom pictures
Single finger on the screen and tilt mobile phone can zoom pictures
Tilt the phone to change pictures
Tilting the phone left or right can change pictures
The screen will continue to light up when you are looking at it
This function detect your face by front-camera, so the screen will stay bright when you face to it
This function will lose efficacy in following situation:
1.Your face is not in front of screen
3.You are in strong light or dark place
Switch launcher and select apps through non-touch gestures
Switch interfaces in gallery and zoom pictures through non-touch gestures
Learn about non-touch operation in standby interface
Wave your palm across the phone (3cm-5cm) to change pages
1.Wave your palm across the phone (3cm-15cm) to change pages
"2.Keep your palm stay above the phone (40cm-100cm) more than 1 second. It's equivalent to tap operation"

"Matters needing attention: 1.The function detect your palm by front-camera. Wave your palm above the phone (3cm-15cm) to switch picture. keep your palm stay above the phone (40cm-100cm) more than 1 second to click. 2.Please pull the fingers open and face the camera in long distance. 3.The function of light effect is larger, in strong light, weak light, backlight, possible failure."
Smart keep bright will be closed when non-touch operation in standby interface is open
Smart keep bright will be closed when non-touch operation in gallery is open
Non-touch operation in standby interface will be closed when smart keep bright is open
Non-touch operation in gallery will be closed when smart keep bright is open
Non-touch operation in standby interface and gallery will be closed when smart keep bright is open

"When screen is black, Wave your palm across the top of the phone (3cm-5cm) to view phones' status"

When screen is black, slide upwards on the screen to unlock
When screen is black, slide upward on the screen to unlock

When screen is black, painting c can wake dialer
"When screen is black, draw 'c' can wake dialer"
When screen is black, painting m can wake music
"When screen is black, draw 'm' can play music"
When screen is black, parallel to the bottom to slide to change-over music
When screen is black, parallel to the bottom to slide to change-over music

When screen is black, slide downwards on the screen to wake camera

When screen is black, slide downward on the screen to photograph
When screen is black, slide screen by fingers as shown to launch camera

"When screen is black, draw 'e' to wake browser"
When screen is black, painting a circle to wake QQ
"When screen is black, draw 'o' to wake QQ"
When screen is black, painting w to wake Wechat
"When screen is black, draw 'w' to wake Wechat"
Wave your palm across the phone to e-book flip
Wave your palm across the top of the phone (3cm-5cm) to e-book flip

Please wave your palm from left to right above the phone (3cm-5cm) to turn to the last page, tap back key to exit

"Wave palm across the top of the phone (3cm-5cm). Events of General-mode will directly be mapped to touch-screen events,so this can compatible with third party applications better. Note that this mode can't work with Professional-mode at the same time, the Professional-mode can custom more complicated operation and behavior"
The general pattern is to simulate the user\'s sliding operation,after opening,free mode option will be invalid,shut down after the general pattern can be restored
